item.title: The New Writer's Room
item.description: Related: Writing Prep for SBS Emerging Writers Competition Episodes Christos Tsiolkas - The act of writing itself teaches you how to write [Alice Pung - ‘My published output is a small fraction of what I write’] [The New Writer’s Room - Being published and the writer-editor relationship] Listen to our Sydney Writers’ Festival panel, ‘What If My Mum Reads This’ Atomic
